#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
short int q,o,l,n;
cin>>n>>q>>o>>l;
int p=100*q+10*o+l,ans=0;
int c=10000/n;
c=c*n;
c=c==10000?10000:c+n;
while(c<100000)
{
int copy=c;
copy/=10;
copy%=1000;
if(copy==p)
ans=c;
c+=n;
}
if(ans)
cout<<ans/10000<<" "<<ans%10<<" "<<ans/n<<endl;
else cout<<ans<<endl;
}
}
